file_content.text: To live is to learn.
I have studied all the writings of the Voss Mystics.
Your heart grows. Perhaps the Shrine of Healing accepts you.
Take this. It may help.
Great lessons await you.
More outsiders? So curious. Like small children.
You wish to know Voss history? Is that why you come? To understand?
I'd like to know more.
Sure, I'm interested.
Curiosity implies intellect.
Not sure I understand....
I am Bera-De. I prepare outsiders to perhaps not die in the shrine.
You're an idiot.
Derision betrays ignorance.
Out there are the writings of Mystics past. Find them. Learn from them.
When you return, I will share what I can.
It's a deal.
I don't have time for this.
If you do not learn, you die in the shrine.
I will show you where to go.
Not interested! [Refuse quest]
This place is not for you.
